TCNtools 0.1.0

    Reference

    Scaling

    Functions to compute scaling coefficients according to various schemes

    atm_pressure()

    Compute atmospheric pressure at site

    get_vdm()

    Get Virtual Dipole Moment time series

    vdm2rc()

    calculate cutoff rigidity from Virtual Dipole Moment time series

    rc_ndp()

    calculate cutoff rigidity from non-dipolar gridded model

    scaling_st()

    Compute scaling parameters according to Stone (2000) (st)

    scaling_lm()

    Compute scaling parameter for the lm scheme (Lal/Stone time dependent)

    solar_modulation()

    Compute solar modulation factor for the LSD scheme

    scaling_lsd()

    scaling_lsd

    lsdrc()

    Compute cutoff rigidities time series for the calculation of scaling factors according to Lifton et al. (2014) 'LSD' scaling scheme

    Solvers

    Functions to compute concentrations or erosion rates

    solv_conc_eul()

    Prediction of concentration evolution over a time interval on an Eulerian grid

    solv_conc_lag()

    Compute concentration evolution along a time-depth history

    solv_ss_eros_eul()

    Compute steady state denudation using Eulerian description for the evolution of concentration

    Two nuclides plots

    Various utility functions for two-nuclides plots

    tnp_ellipse()

    Compute uncertainty ellipses for two-nuclides plot

    tnp_curves()

    Compute steady state denudation and constant exposure curves for two-nuclides plots

    tnp_burial()

    Compute burial age and denudation rate curves array for two-nuclides plots

    Soil mixing

    Functions to compute concentrations and production rates in mixed soils

    depth_averaged_prod()

    Average nuclide production rate in soil

    conc_soil_mixing()

    Nuclide concentration in a vertically mixed soil

    tnp_soil_mixing()

    Compute constant depth and denudation rate curves array for two-nuclides plots

    soil_mixing_depth()

    Steady state soil mixing depth

    Muons production profiles

    Functions to compute muon production at depth (non exponential profiles)

    mu_model1a()

    Muons production profile according to model 1A of Balco (2017)

    mu_model1b()

    Muons production profile according to model 1B of Balco (2017)

    Fluxes

    Functions for particule fluxes

    sato_muons()

    Compute muons flux using the analytical formulation of Sato et al. (2008)

    sato_neutrons()

    Compute neutron flux using the analytical formulation of Sato et al. (2008)

    sato_neutrons_low()

    Compute low energy neutron flux using the analytical formulation of Sato et al. (2008)

    sato_protons()

    Compute protons flux using the analytical formulation of Sato et al. (2008)

    Depth profile

    Functions for depth profil analysis

    depth_profile_mc()

    Monte Carlo exploration for a depth profile

    Data

    Datasets included in the package

    prm

    A set of reference parameters for SLHL production rates and decay constant

    Lambda

    A set of attenuation lengths for cosmogenic nuclides production pathways

    tcn_depth_profiles

    A dataset of depth profiles (10Be)

    Contents
